sqoop.arg: "select * from (select X1.UPDDAT RAPID_MODIFIED_DATE, X1.ACCIDR, X1.ACCDAT, X1.FLTNUM, X1.STADAT, X1.ENDDAT, X1.FRMARPCOD, X1.TOOARPCOD, X1.USRCOD, X1.UPDDAT, X1.FLTDAT, X1.STATIM, X1.ENDTIM, X1.PENLV2LV3, X1.INPPRVCALSTA from FLPTRNACC X1 where X1.UPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) where $CONDITIONS"

"select * from (select SYSDATE RAPID_MODIFIED_DATE, X1.BATSEQ, X1.FLTNUM, X1.FLTDAT, X1.FRMARPCOD, X1.TOOARPCOD, X1.RCVDAT, X1.ACFRGNNUM, X1.CFGFST, X1.CFGBUS, X1.CFGECO, X1.TOBBAT, X1.NUMFSTPAX, X1.NUMFSTCBG, X1.NUMFSTEXS, X1.NUMFSTSTR, X1.NUMBUSPAX, X1.NUMBUSCBG, X1.NUMBUSEXS, X1.NUMBUSSTR, X1.NUMECOPAX, X1.NUMECOCBG, X1.NUMECOEXS, X1.NUMECOSTR, X1.NUMINFPAX, X1.OALCPNVAL, X1.NUMOALPAX, X1.NUMEMRMCO, X1.NUMOALMCO, X1.NUMEMREBT, X1.NUMOALEBT, X1.CHRPAXIND, X1.CHRNUMPAX, X1.BATSTA, X1.ACCIND, X1.FLTTYP, X1.USRCOD, X1.UPDDAT, X1.EXCCPNIND, X1.CHRAGRRFR, X1.CVWIND, X1.RMK, X1.SUBACCCOD, X1.NUMFIM, X1.NUMETK, X1.ARCSTA, X1.OWNFIMCNT, X1.OWNFIMPAXCNT, X1.OALFIMCNT, X1.OALFIMPAXCNT, X1.TOTMCO, X1.TOTEBT, X1.OWNFIMEBTCNT, X1.OALFIMEBTCNT, X1.QAPUSRCOD, X1.QAPUPDDAT, X1.DEDLOD, X1.PAYLOD, X1.ETKTOBMATIND, X1.ETKTRNSEQ, X1.CREUSRCOD, X1.CREDAT, X1.SYSMANIND, X1.FRCDBATBAL, X1.BATSRC, X1.NUMOWNEMD, X1.NUMOALEMD, X1.TOTEMD, X1.OWNFIMEMDCNT, X1.OALFIMEMDCNT from FLPBATHDR X1,(SELECT DISTINCT X2.FLTNUM,X2.FLTDAT,X2.FRMARPCOD,X2.TOOARPCOD FROM FLPCLOSTA X2 where X2.UPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ) DRIVER WHERE X1.FLTNUM = DRIVER.FLTNUM and X1.FLTDAT = DRIVER.FLTDAT and X1.frmarpcod = DRIVER.FRMARPCOD and X1.tooarpcod = DRIVER.TOOARPCOD) where $CONDITIONS"

"select * from (SELECT 0 RAPID_SEQ, X2.UPDDAT RAPID_MODIFIED_DATE, X4.SALDAT ISSUE_DATE, X1.BATSEQ, X1.TRNTYP, X1.CARNUMCOD, X1.DOCNUM, X1.CPNNUM, X1.CTACOD, X1.FARCURCOD, X1.GRSFARAMT, X1.ISCPCT, X1.CHKWGT, X1.CHKPCS, X1.POOTKT, X1.SECMISTYP, X1.NMTCPNSTA, X1.CLONUM, X1.CLODAT, X1.ACCIND, X1.REJIND, X1.BILSTA, X1.PRICPNIND, X1.USRCOD, X1.UPDDAT, X1.ASOIDR, X1.PAXCNTIND, X1.REVPAXIND, X1.FLPTRNSEQ, X1.MCOUTLVAL, X1.ACCIDR, X1.CVWIND, X1.MCOUTLCUR, X1.ENDIND, X1.CLOIND, X1.DOCTYP, X1.DATSRC, X1.ETKIND, X1.DUMIND, X1.FLNISSCTYCOD, X1.FLNSALDAT, X1.FLNFABCOD, X1.FLNEXCWGT, X1.FLNEXCPCS, X1.COUEBTIND, X1.MCOSRVTYP, X1.ENTFABCOD, X1.ENTSECMISTYP, X1.SACCOD, X1.SOUIND, X1.MANTAXREA, X1.CPNTAXSTA, X1.FLNTAXACCIDR, X1.SYSTAXREA, X1.CPNVALIDR, X1.CPNVALSTA, X1.REACOD, X1.CPNVALUSR, X1.CPNVALDAT, X1.ETKTRNSEQ, X1.INPPRVCALIDR, X1.INPPRVACCIDR, X1.FLNTAXPRC, X1.FLNTAXPRCDAT, X1.SABLYTRUNSEQ, X1.FLNSALIND, X1.TOTFLNSURAMT, X1.TOTFLNTAXAMT, X1.TOTSALSURAMT, X1.TOTSALTAXAMT, X1.FIMIND, X1.TKTSALDAT, X1.REUIND, X1.ACTCHKPCS, X1.ACTCHKWGT, X1.TOTBAG FROM SLPDOCHDR X4, FLPDOCTRN X1, FLPBATHDR X3, FLPCLOSTA X2 where X2.UPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and X3.FLTNUM = X2.FLTNUM and X3.FLTDAT = X2.FLTDAT and X3.FRMARPCOD = X2.FRMARPCOD and X3.TOOARPCOD = X2.TOOARPCOD and X1.BATSEQ = X3.BATSEQ and X1.CLONUM = X2.CLONUM and X4.DOCNUM = X1.DOCNUM and X4.CARNUMCOD = X1.CARNUMCOD and X1.accidr is null) where $CONDITIONS"

"select (select nvl(min(clonum),0) from flpclosta where upddat BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')), (select nvl(max(clonum) ,0) from FLPCLOSTA where upddat BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) from dual"

"select * from (SELECT X3.UNQSEQNUM RAPID_SEQ, X3.UPDDAT RAPID_MODIFIED_DATE, X2.SALDAT ISSUE_DATE, X1.BATSEQ, X1.TRNTYP, X1.CARNUMCOD, X1.DOCNUM, X1.CPNNUM, X1.CTACOD, X1.FARCURCOD, X1.GRSFARAMT, X1.ISCPCT, X1.CHKWGT, X1.CHKPCS, X1.POOTKT, X1.SECMISTYP, X1.NMTCPNSTA, X1.CLONUM, X1.CLODAT, X1.ACCIND, X1.REJIND, X1.BILSTA, X1.PRICPNIND, X1.USRCOD, X1.UPDDAT, X1.ASOIDR, X1.PAXCNTIND, X1.REVPAXIND, X1.FLPTRNSEQ, X1.MCOUTLVAL, X1.ACCIDR, X1.CVWIND, X1.MCOUTLCUR, X1.ENDIND, X1.CLOIND, X1.DOCTYP, X1.DATSRC, X1.ETKIND, X1.DUMIND, X1.FLNISSCTYCOD, X1.FLNSALDAT, X1.FLNFABCOD, X1.FLNEXCWGT, X1.FLNEXCPCS, X1.COUEBTIND, X1.MCOSRVTYP, X1.ENTFABCOD, X1.ENTSECMISTYP, X1.SACCOD, X1.SOUIND, X1.MANTAXREA, X1.CPNTAXSTA, X1.FLNTAXACCIDR, X1.SYSTAXREA, X1.CPNVALIDR, X1.CPNVALSTA, X1.REACOD, X1.CPNVALUSR, X1.CPNVALDAT, X1.ETKTRNSEQ, X1.INPPRVCALIDR, X1.INPPRVACCIDR, X1.FLNTAXPRC, X1.FLNTAXPRCDAT, X1.SABLYTRUNSEQ, X1.FLNSALIND, X1.TOTFLNSURAMT, X1.TOTFLNTAXAMT, X1.TOTSALSURAMT, X1.TOTSALTAXAMT, X1.FIMIND, X1.TKTSALDAT, X1.REUIND, X1.ACTCHKPCS, X1.ACTCHKWGT, X1.TOTBAG FROM SLPDOCHDR X2, FLPDOCTRN X1, FLPTKTDELTAIDN X3 WHERE X3.UPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND X1.BATSEQ = X3.BATSEQ AND X1.ACCIDR = X3.ACCIDR AND X2.DOCNUM = X1.DOCNUM AND X2.CARNUMCOD = X1.CARNUMCOD) where $CONDITIONS"

"select (select nvl(min(unqseqnum),0) from FLPTKTDELTAIDN where upddat BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')), (select nvl(max(unqseqnum),0) from FLPTKTDELTAIDN where upddat BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) from dual"

"SELECT X3.UNQSEQNUM RAPID_SEQ, X3.UPDDAT RAPID_MODIFIED_DATE, X2.SALDAT ISSUE_DATE, X1.CARNUMCOD, X1.SALDOCNUM, X1.DOCNUM, X1.CPNNUM, X1.TAXCOD, X1.CNTCOD, X1.TAXSERNUM, X1.TAXAPLSERNUM, X1.CURCOD, X1.COLTAXAMT, X1.TAXMGTTYP, X1.RUNSEQ, X1.FLTDAT, X1.BATSEQ, X1.FLNSALIND, X1.ACCCOD, X1.ACCCSTCOD, X1.TAXREVACCCOD, X1.FRZIDR, X1.CBKCOLREFAMT, X1.CBKTAXAMT, X1.TAXPROTYP, X1.SRPSOU, X1.SRPTOTAMT, X1.UPDDAT, X1.USRCOD, X1.SURIND, X1.TAXREVCSTCOD, X1.ACCSOU, X1.CLDTAXAMT, X1.COSALNCEVAL, X1.PAYCURCOD, X1.PAYEXCRATTYP, X1.PAYEXCRAT, X1.PAYCONVDAT, X1.PAYCOLAMT, X1.PAYCLDAMT, X1.EXCDIFAMT, X1.EXCDIFACC ,X1.PAYCBKTAXAMT FROM SLPDOCHDR X2, FLPDOCTAX X1, FLPTKTDELTAIDN X3 WHERE X3.UPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND X1.FRZIDR = X3.ACCIDR AND X1.BATSEQ = X3.BATSEQ AND X2.DOCNUM = X1.DOCNUM AND X2.CARNUMCOD = X1.CARNUMCOD AND $CONDITIONS"

"select (select nvl(min(unqseqnum),0) from FLPTKTDELTAIDN where upddat BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')), (select nvl(max(unqseqnum),0) from FLPTKTDELTAIDN where upddat BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) from dual"

"SELECT * FROM (SELECT X1.FIMIDR, X1.SYSFIMIDR, X1.RCVFLTNUM, X1.RCVFLTDAT, X1.RCVFRMARP, X1.RCVTOOARP, X1.DLVCARNUM, X1.DLVFLTNUM, X1.DLVFLTDAT, X1.DLVFRMARP, X1.DLVTOOARP, X1.PAXEBTIND, X1.NUMFSTPAX, X1.NUMBUSPAX, X1.NUMECOPAX, X1.NUMTOTPAX, X1.NUMTOTEBT, X1.PAXBILAMT, X1.PAXISCAMT, X1.EBTBILAMT, X1.FIMDOC, X1.NUMINFPAX, X1.USRCOD, X1.UPDDAT, X1.CODIDR, X1.ACCIDR, X1.CBKPAXBILAMT, X1.CBKPAXISCAMT, X1.CBKEBTBILAMT, X1.OALNUMFSTPAX, X1.OALNUMBUSPAX, X1.OALNUMECOPAX, X1.OALNUMTOTPAX, X1.OALNUMTOTEBT, X1.OALNUMINFPAX, X1.DOCNUM, X1.CPNNUM, X1.CLOIND, X1.NUMFSTCHD, X1.NUMBUSCHD, X1.NUMECOCHD, X1.OALNUMFSTCHD, X1.OALNUMBUSCHD, X1.OALNUMECOCHD, X1.PROSTA, X1.NUMBUSINF, X1.NUMFSTINF, X1.OALNUMBUSINF, X1.OALNUMFSTINF, X1.FFABILAMT, X1.FFAISCAMT, X1.SYSTAXREA, X1.MANTAXREA, X1.CLOUSRCOD, X1.CLOUPDDAT, X1.CREUSRCOD, X1.CREDAT, X1.OWNEMDCNT, X1.OALEMDCNT, X1.EMDBILAMT, X1.CBKEMDBILAMT, X1.CBKPAXBILPRVAMT, X1.PRVPRC, X1.UTLCMPCOD, X1.UTLPOSCOD FROM FLPFIMHDR X1 WHERE X1.CLOUPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND ACCIDR IS NULL UNION SELECT X1.FIMIDR, X1.SYSFIMIDR, X1.RCVFLTNUM, X1.RCVFLTDAT, X1.RCVFRMARP, X1.RCVTOOARP, X1.DLVCARNUM, X1.DLVFLTNUM, X1.DLVFLTDAT, X1.DLVFRMARP, X1.DLVTOOARP, X1.PAXEBTIND, X1.NUMFSTPAX, X1.NUMBUSPAX, X1.NUMECOPAX, X1.NUMTOTPAX, X1.NUMTOTEBT, X1.PAXBILAMT, X1.PAXISCAMT, X1.EBTBILAMT, X1.FIMDOC, X1.NUMINFPAX, X1.USRCOD, X2.UPDDAT, X1.CODIDR, X1.ACCIDR, X1.CBKPAXBILAMT, X1.CBKPAXISCAMT, X1.CBKEBTBILAMT, X1.OALNUMFSTPAX, X1.OALNUMBUSPAX, X1.OALNUMECOPAX, X1.OALNUMTOTPAX, X1.OALNUMTOTEBT, X1.OALNUMINFPAX, X1.DOCNUM, X1.CPNNUM, X1.CLOIND, X1.NUMFSTCHD, X1.NUMBUSCHD, X1.NUMECOCHD, X1.OALNUMFSTCHD, X1.OALNUMBUSCHD, X1.OALNUMECOCHD, X1.PROSTA, X1.NUMBUSINF, X1.NUMFSTINF, X1.OALNUMBUSINF, X1.OALNUMFSTINF, X1.FFABILAMT, X1.FFAISCAMT, X1.SYSTAXREA, X1.MANTAXREA, X1.CLOUSRCOD, X2.UPDDAT, X1.CREUSRCOD, X1.CREDAT, X1.OWNEMDCNT, X1.OALEMDCNT, X1.EMDBILAMT, X1.CBKEMDBILAMT, X1.CBKPAXBILPRVAMT, X1.PRVPRC, X1.UTLCMPCOD, X1.UTLPOSCOD FROM FLPFIMHDR X1, FLPTRNACC X2 WHERE X1.ACCIDR = X2.ACCIDR AND X2.UPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ) WHERE $CONDITIONS"

"SELECT X1.SYSFIMIDR,X1.CARNUMCOD,X1.DOCNUM,X1.CPNNUM,X1.FABCOD,X1.BOKCLS,X1.BILAMT,X1.ISCPCT,X1.SPACOD,X1.BILCOD,X1.EXCWGT,X1.UPDDAT,X1.USRCOD,X1.DOCPROSTA,X1.ISSCTYCOD,X1.FFAIDR,X1.SYSTAXREA,X1.MANTAXREA,X1.CREUSRCOD,X1.CREDAT,X1.CBKAMT,X1.CBKPRVAMT FROM FLPFIMDTL X1 WHERE SYSFIMIDR IN (SELECT SYSFIMIDR FROM FLPFIMHDR WHERE CLOUPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AND $CONDITIONS"

"SELECT 1 RAPID_SEQ, SYSDATE RAPID_MODIFIED_DATE, DRIVER.ISSUE_DATE, DRIVER.SALDOCNUM TKTDOCNUM, X1.CARNUMCOD, X1.SALDOCNUM, X1.DOCNUM, X1.CPNNUM, X1.TAXCOD, X1.CNTCOD, X1.TAXSERNUM, X1.TAXAPLSERNUM, X1.EXMSERNUM, X1.EXMDES, X1.USRCOD, X1.UPDDAT, X1.SOURCE FROM SLPTXPEXMDTL X1, (SELECT DISTINCT X2.ISSUE_DATE, X2.SALDOCNUM, X2.CARNUMCOD, X2.DOCNUM FROM SLPTKTDELTAIDN X2 WHERE X2.UPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ) DRIVER WHERE X1.DOCNUM = DRIVER.DOCNUM and X1.CARNUMCOD = DRIVER.CARNUMCOD AND $CONDITIONS"

"select (select nvl(min(docnum),0) from SLPTKTDELTAIDN where upddat BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')), (select nvl(max(docnum),0) from SLPTKTDELTAIDN where upddat BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) from dual"

"SELECT X1.UPDDAT RAPID_MODIFIED_DATE, X2.SALDAT ISSUE_DATE, nvl(X3.SALDOCNUM, X1.DOCNUM) TKTDOCNUM, X1.UNQSEQNUM, X1.CARNUMCOD, X1.DOCNUM, X1.PAXNAM, X1.APDTYP, X1.APDIDR, X1.MFL_ID, X1.PAXREFNUM, X1.PAXDOB, X1.PAXNAT, X1.GENDER, X1.PASNUM, X1.IDDOCTYP, X1.USRCOD, X1.UPDDAT, X1.TKTTYP FROM SLPCNJREI X3, SLPDOCHDR X2, SLPAPDDTL X1, (SELECT DISTINCT DOCNUM,CARNUMCOD FROM FLPDOCTRN X4, FLPBATHDR X5, FLPCLOSTA X6 where X6.UPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and X5.FLTNUM = X6.FLTNUM and X5.FLTDAT = X6.FLTDAT and X5.FRMARPCOD = X6.FRMARPCOD and X5.TOOARPCOD = X6.TOOARPCOD and X4.BATSEQ = X5.BATSEQ and X4.CLONUM = X6.CLONUM ) DRIVER where X1.DOCNUM = DRIVER.DOCNUM and X1.CARNUMCOD = DRIVER.CARNUMCOD and X2.DOCNUM = X1.DOCNUM and X2.CARNUMCOD = X1.CARNUMCOD and X3.Docnum(+) = X2.Docnum and x3.carcod(+) = x2.carnumcod and cnjreiind(+) = 'C' AND $CONDITIONS"
"select (select min(apdidr) from SLPAPDDTL), (select max(apdidr) from SLPAPDDTL) from dual"

"select * from ( select 1 RAPID_SEQ, X1.CREDAT RAPID_MODIFIED_DATE, DRIVER.ISSUE_DATE, X1.CARNUMCOD, X1.DOCNUM, X1.CPNNUM, X1.CURCOD, X1.TAXAMT, X1.TAXCOD, X1.CBLTAXAMT, X1.PAYTAXAMT, X1.COLTAXAMT, X1.CLDTAXAMT, X1.TAXCURCOD, X1.CNJDOCNUM, X1.DATCAPSRC, X1.CBKTAXAMT, X1.TAXSEQNUM, X1.TAXSERNUM, X1.TAXAPLSERNUM, X1.CNTCOD, X1.COLREFAMT, X1.CBKCOLREFAMT, X1.FOPSTLAMT, X1.TRNTYP, X1.TAXREFFLG, X1.EXMFLG, X1.EXMSERNUM, X1.AUDSTA, X1.AUDIDR, X1.BATSEQ, X1.TAXBAS, X1.ACTCOLREFAMT, X1.AUDREACOD, X1.AUDEXMCOD, X1.ADMSTA, X1.ADMACMNUM, X1.COMSOVIND, X1.COMSOTIND, X1.USRCOD, X1.CREDAT, X1.FEDTRNSEQ, X1.ADCTAXAMT, X1.CBKADCTAXAMT, X1.COSALNCEVAL, X1.PAYCURCOD, X1.PAYEXCRATTYP, X1.PAYEXCRAT, X1.PAYCONVDAT, X1.PAYCOLAMT, X1.PAYCLDAMT, X1.EXCDIFAMT, X1.EXCDIFACC, X1.PAYCBKTAXAMT, X1.ACCCOD, X1.ACCCSTCOD, X1.TAXREVACCCOD, X1.TAXREVCSTCOD from slpdoctax X1, (SELECT DISTINCT X2.ISSUE_DATE, X2.SALDOCNUM TKTDOCNUM, X2.CARNUMCOD, X2.DOCNUM FROM SLPTKTDELTAIDN X2 WHERE X2.UPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and upper(X2.carnumcod) <> '176') DRIVER WHERE X1.CNJDOCNUM = DRIVER.DOCNUM AND X1.CARNUMCOD = DRIVER.CARNUMCOD AND X1.CPNNUM <> 0 AND X1.TRNTYP = 'F' UNION select 1 RAPID_SEQ, SYSDATE RAPID_MODIFIED_DATE, X4.SALDAT ISSUE_DATE, X1.CARNUMCOD, X1.DOCNUM, X1.CPNNUM, X1.CURCOD, X1.TAXAMT, X1.TAXCOD, X1.CBLTAXAMT, X1.PAYTAXAMT, X1.COLTAXAMT, X1.CLDTAXAMT, X1.TAXCURCOD, X1.CNJDOCNUM, X1.DATCAPSRC, X1.CBKTAXAMT, X1.TAXSEQNUM, X1.TAXSERNUM, X1.TAXAPLSERNUM, X1.CNTCOD, X1.COLREFAMT, X1.CBKCOLREFAMT, X1.FOPSTLAMT, X1.TRNTYP, X1.TAXREFFLG, X1.EXMFLG, X1.EXMSERNUM, X1.AUDSTA, X1.AUDIDR, X1.BATSEQ, X1.TAXBAS, X1.ACTCOLREFAMT, X1.AUDREACOD, X1.AUDEXMCOD, X1.ADMSTA, X1.ADMACMNUM, X1.COMSOVIND, X1.COMSOTIND, X1.USRCOD, X1.CREDAT, X1.FEDTRNSEQ, X1.ADCTAXAMT, X1.CBKADCTAXAMT, X1.COSALNCEVAL, X1.PAYCURCOD, X1.PAYEXCRATTYP, X1.PAYEXCRAT, X1.PAYCONVDAT, X1.PAYCOLAMT, X1.PAYCLDAMT, X1.EXCDIFAMT, X1.EXCDIFACC, X1.PAYCBKTAXAMT, X1.ACCCOD, X1.ACCCSTCOD, X1.TAXREVACCCOD, X1.TAXREVCSTCOD from slpdochdr X4,slpdoctax X1,flpdoctrn X2,flptrnacc X3 WHERE X3.UPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND X2.ACCIDR = X3.ACCIDR AND upper(X2.carnumcod) <> '176' AND X1.CNJDOCNUM = X2.DOCNUM AND X1.CARNUMCOD = X2.CARNUMCOD AND X1.CPNNUM = X2.CPNNUM AND X1.CPNNUM <> 0 AND X1.TRNTYP = 'F' AND X4.DOCNUM = X1.CNJDOCNUM AND X4.CARNUMCOD = X1.CARNUMCOD ) WHERE $CONDITIONS"
"select (select min(DOCNUM) from SLPDOCTAX), (select max(docnum) from SLPDOCTAX ) from dual"

"select * from (SELECT X3.UNQSEQNUM RAPID_SEQ, X3.UPDDAT RAPID_MODIFIED_DATE, X2.SALDAT ISSUE_DATE, X1.DOCNUM, X1.CARNUMCOD, X1.CPNNUM, X1.ORGCPNAMT, X1.ORGDSCAMT, X1.ORGCOMAMT, X1.ORGORCAMT, X1.ORGLOCCOD, X1.FLNCPNAMT, X1.FLNDSCAMT, X1.FLNCOMAMT, X1.FLNORCAMT, X1.UTLBATIDR, X1.DUMIND, X1.ORGVATISCAMT, X1.FLNVATISCAMT, X1.POOACCCOD, X1.FLNCSCCOMAMT, X1.ORGCSCCOMAMT FROM SLPDOCHDR X2, SLPCPNACC X1, FLPDOCTRN X4, FLPTKTDELTAIDN X3 WHERE X3.UPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND X4.BATSEQ = X3.BATSEQ AND X4.ACCIDR = X3.ACCIDR AND X1.DOCNUM = X4.DOCNUM AND X1.CARNUMCOD = X4.CARNUMCOD AND X1.CPNNUM = X4.CPNNUM AND X2.DOCNUM = X1.DOCNUM AND X2.CARNUMCOD = X1.CARNUMCOD) where $CONDITIONS"

"select (select nvl(min(unqseqnum), 0) from FLPTKTDELTAIDN where upddat BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')), (select nvl(max(unqseqnum), 0) from FLPTKTDELTAIDN where upddat BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) from dual"

"SELECT X2.UPDDAT RAPID_MODIFIED_DATE, X4.SALDAT ISSUE_DATE, X1.TRNTYP, X1.DOCTYP, X1.CARNUMCOD, X1.DOCNUM, X1.CPNNUM, X1.UTLDAT, X1.CBLCPNAMT, X1.CBLISCAMT, X1.CBLTAXAMT, X1.BILSTA, X1.BILMTH, X1.BILIND, X1.BATSEQ, X1.CTYCOD, X1.REJIND, X1.SALCURCOD, X1.INVFTNNUM, X1.INVFINYER, X1.SUPINVIND, X1.SUPINVFTNNUM, X1.SUPINVFINYER, X1.SUPAPLCURCOD, X1.SUPMMREXCRAT, X1.SUPFDREXCRAT, X1.SUPCBLCPNAMT, X1.SUPCBLISCAMT, X1.FLTNUM, X1.FRMARPCOD, X1.TOOARPCOD, X1.UTLBATIDR, X1.LV2DAT, X1.TRNACCIDR, X1.BILCARCOD, X1.FLNACCDAT, X1.VATFAR, X1.VATISC, X1.EXCDIFACCDAT, X1.CBKEXCDIFAMT, X1.CBKEXCFTNNUM, X1.CBKEXCFINYER, X1.SOUCOD, X1.ACHBATIDR, X1.ACHSUPBATIDR, X1.ETKIND, X1.SACCOD, X1.ADDPROFLG, X1.SUPCBLTAXAMT, X1.SUPINVEXCFTNNUM, X1.SUPINVEXCFINYER, X1.SUPINVCBKCPNAMT, X1.SUPINVCBKISCAMT, X1.SUPINVCBKTAXAMT, X1.OALSRTSEQ, X1.VATONNFAR, X1.VATONNISC, X1.CONVDAT, X1.FNFBILIND, X1.COLCURCOD, X1.COLCPNAMT, X1.COLISCAMT, X1.COLTAXAMT, X1.COLVATONNISC, X1.COLVATONNFAR, X1.COICURCOD, X1.COICPNAMT, X1.COIISCAMT, X1.COITAXAMT, X1.COIVATONNISC, X1.COIVATONNFAR, X1.SUPCOLCURCOD, X1.SUPCOLCPNAMT, X1.SUPCOLISCAMT, X1.SUPCOICURCOD, X1.SUPCOICPNAMT, X1.SUPCOIISCAMT, X1.SUPUSDSALFDRRAT, X1.SUPSALUSDFDRRAT, X1.SUPUSDCOLFDRRAT, X1.SUPCOLCOIFDRRAT, X1.SUPSALUSDMMRRAT, X1.SUPUSDCOLMMRRAT, X1.SUPCOLCOIMMRRAT, X1.COLCOIEXCRAT, X1.FIXVALIND, X1.SUPCOLTAXAMT, X1.SUPCOITAXAMT, X1.RFICOD, X1.RFISUBCOD, X1.CBLHNDFEEAMT, X1.CBLUATDSCAMT, X1.CBLOTHCOMAMT, X1.CBLVATAMT, X1.COLHNDFEEAMT, X1.COLUATDSCAMT, X1.COLOTHCOMAMT, X1.COLVATAMT, X1.COIHNDFEEAMT, X1.COIUATDSCAMT, X1.COIOTHCOMAMT, X1.COIVATAMT, X1.SUPCOLHNDFEEAMT, X1.SUPCOLUATDSCAMT, X1.SUPCOLOTHCOMAMT, X1.SUPCOLVATAMT, X1.SUPCOIHNDFEEAMT, X1.SUPCOIUATDSCAMT, X1.SUPCOIOTHCOMAMT, X1.SUPCOIVATAMT, X1.SUPINVCBKHNDFEEAMT, X1.SUPINVCBKUATDSCAMT, X1.SUPINVCBKOTHCOMAMT, X1.SUPINVCBKVATAMT, X1.SUPCBLHNDFEEAMT, X1.SUPCBLUATDSCAMT, X1.SUPCBLOTHCOMAMT, X1.SUPCBLVATAMT, X1.HNDFEETYP, X1.SISSOUCOD, X1.RESLVL FROM SLPDOCHDR X4, OBLPAXCPN X1, FLPDOCTRN X5, FLPBATHDR X3, FLPCLOSTA X2 where X2.UPDDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE('${START_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('${END_DATE}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and X3.FLTNUM = X2.FLTNUM and X3.FLTDAT = X2.FLTDAT and X3.FRMARPCOD = X2.FRMARPCOD and X3.TOOARPCOD = X2.TOOARPCOD and X5.BATSEQ = X3.BATSEQ and X5.CLONUM = X2.CLONUM and upper(X5.carnumcod) <> '176' and X1.DOCNUM = X5.DOCNUM and X1.CARNUMCOD = X5.CARNUMCOD AND x1.CPNNUM = X5.CPNNUM and X4.DOCNUM = X1.DOCNUM and X4.CARNUMCOD = X1.CARNUMCOD AND $CONDITIONS"
"select (select min(docnum) from oblpaxcpn ), (select max(docnum) from oblpaxcpn ) from dual"
